name: Aa'une the Oligarch, Projection / Aa'une the Oligarch, Avatar
effect: Aa'une the Oligarch starts the game and comes into play with this side face-up.

Outperform all Disciplines 20

effect: C:25 P:30 W:55 S:45

Warbeasts you control have "Waterproof 25."

name: Agitos
effect: 1MC: Deal 5 damage to target Creature.

name: Annex of the Arcane (not a printed card)
effect: At the beginning of combat, flip a coin. If heads, your engaged Creature gains a Mugic counter. If tails, the opposing engaged Creature gains a Mugic counter.
Creatures with one or more Mugic counters have an additional 10 Energy.

name: Banshor
effect: Recklessness 5

name: Blak'drin
effect: C:60 P:65 W:55 S:70
Air attacks and Water attacks deal an additional 5 damage to Blak'drin.
When Blak'drin is dealt Air or Water damage, deal 10 damage to the Creature which played that attack.
Loyal - M'arrillians or Minions

name: Bodal's Element Converter (not a printed card)
effect: Equipped Creature has "Fire 5" and "Water 5."
When equipped Creature deals 25 or more damage with a single attack, flip Bodal's Element Converter face-down.

name: Cerbie
effect: Intimidate: Power 10
As the UnderWorld guardian of The Passage, Cerbie is forever vigilant against any potential invasion from the OverWorld.

effect: Deal 5 damage for each Attack Card in your Attack Discard pile. If you have 7 or more Attack Cards in your Attack Discard pile, deal 0 damage instead.

effect: C:30 P:50 W:20 S:20
Sacrifice a Battlegear: Target Taskmaster gains 40 to all Disciplines. Use this ability only once per turn.

name: Khybon's Scrapyard (not a printed card)
effect: When a Battlegear is put into a discard pile, put a Scrap counter on Khybon's Scrapyard. Then, if it has 3 or more Scrap counters, return up to 1 Battlegear from your discard pile to play equipped to an unequipped Creature you control and your opponent reveals a new active Location.

name: Mommark's Energy Infuser (not a printed card)
effect: At the beginning of combat, equipped Creature gains 5 Energy for each Mugic counter on it. The equipped Creature may gain no more than 40 Energy this way.

Unique

name: Mommark, Clonemaster (not a printed card)
effect: C:45 P:30 W:85 S:85
At the beginning of your turn, Mommark gains a Mugic counter.

When another Creature you control is defeated, remove all Mugic counters from Mommark. If you have removed 5 or more Mugic counters this way, return that Creature to play in an unoccupied space with no Mugic counters.
Unique, Loyal

name: Najarin's Tower of Song (not a printed card)
effect: Deal 20 damage to target Creature on your side of the Battleboard.
That Creature's controller discards a random Mugic Card from his or her hand.
